Articles.Content:
Hi!

Currently, we have one reputation "type" which affect every contracts you can have.

But what about having a reputation for each contract type: if you fail to fulfill a lot of survey contract(for exemple), you would get less survey contracts(or less money, or easier surveys)); if you fulfill a lot of survey contracts, you would get more survey contract(or more money, or harder surveys).

This way, I think it would be more realistic: the "company" in KSP would "decide" wether to give you the contracts by looking your ability to fulfilling them.
